timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change COMMENT

If the action result is successful on a logical client, then the action will sent to the logical server for processing. COMMENT

If the action result is successful on a logical client, then the action will be sent to the logical server for processing.

This method is called on both the logical client and logical server, so take caution when overriding this method. + COMMENT The logical side can be checked using {@link net.minecraft.world.World#isClient() world.isClient()}. + COMMENT + COMMENT

If the action result is successful on a logical client, then the action will sent to the logical server for processing.
